Serialized Form

Package script

Class script.Bloc extends java.lang.Object implements Serializable

serialVersionUID: 1L

Serialized Fields

name

java.lang.String name
The name of the bloc. Can be used as a comment.

x

int x
The x position of the bloc

y

int y
The y position of the bloc

width

int width
The width of the bloc

height

int height
The height of the bloc

script

Script script
The parent script that is the container of this bloc

nextBlocs

Bloc[] nextBlocs
This array holds next blocs of this bloc. Any Bloc has a maximum of two next blocs. If it is a DoBloc, it has only one next bloc. If it is an IfBloc, it has two next blocs, if it is a Function it can have two next bloc. For IfBloc, the bloc of index zero is the next true branch bloc whereas the bloc of index one is the next false branch bloc. When Function has two next bloc, it means that this Function is part of a DoBloc as the last bloc of this loop and as a consequence one of these next blocs goes to its parent DoBloc.

previousBlocs

java.util.List<E> previousBlocs
This array list holds all the previous bloc of this bloc. Any bloc can have any number of previous blocs.

previousBlocsIsLastBlocInDoBloc

java.util.List<E> previousBlocsIsLastBlocInDoBloc
This boolean array list holds informations on the kinds of previous bloc of this bloc. When this information is true for an index i, it tells that this bloc is a DoBloc and that the previous bloc of index i is the last bloc of this do bloc.

Class script.ConditionalBloc extends Bloc implements Serializable

serialVersionUID: 1L

Serialized Fields

leftOperand

java.lang.String leftOperand
The left operand of the comparison.

operator

Operator operator
The operator of the comparison.

rightOperand

java.lang.String rightOperand
The right operand of the comparison.

Class script.DoBloc extends ConditionalBloc implements Serializable

serialVersionUID: 1L

Class script.Function extends Bloc implements Serializable

serialVersionUID: 1L

Serialized Fields

fileName

java.lang.String fileName
The name of the file that gives information on the behavior of this function. This is a pointer to file in the file system, but it is not an absolute path, just the last segment of this path.

Class script.IfBloc extends ConditionalBloc implements Serializable

serialVersionUID: 1L

serialVersionUID: 1L

Serialized Fields

java.lang.String name
The name of the script

List of blocs contained in the initialize phase

List of blocs contained in the loop phase

List of blocs contained in the finalize phase
